ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Good duo for dungeon play?
ygData.msgSnippet: In game marriages are more common than you might think. My wife and I had our Ogres get married almost 3 years ago...it was less common then. We had
ygData.messageBody:
In game marriages are more common than you might think. My wife and I had our Ogres get married almost 3 years ago...it was less common then. We had GMs,guides,etc... all there. Since then we have been to lots of weddings. Sometimes between people that know each other in r/l other times only in game.
You don't have to have to notify a GM before hand but if you want something special you should....after the wedding you can petition to change last names so they are they same. The marriage means what the couple want it to.
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Nuada Armat'gh
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, June 20, 2002 6:56 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Good duo for dungeon play?



I recently met a couple of ppl who were getting married in-game, im curious as to what this means, what the implications are game-wise etc.

does anyone know where thier is any information on this part of the roleplaying thing?, i tried a search on google, boy that was a misstake-nothing but ppl whining cos there marriage's broke up:( . anyway if anyone can provide any information at all regarding in-game marriages.

Thanks
